QuestData.Title: Return to Vestia
QuestData.Description: The soft glow from the pedestal brightens, and you can see a simple chain left behind. Is this what the apprentice was searching for?
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Darkmist Amulet to Vestia Moonspear at the Tower of Estulan.
QuestData.RewardText: How horrible... for someone so young and full of promise to fall to demons!$B$BI beg your forgiveness for sending you into danger as well, $n. I hope you don't cross paths with that demoness again...
